name: PepetMasterTest
description:
YOU DO NOT CONTROL PEEPO. ONLY CREATE BUILD AND USE 1 ABILITY

Something something...

You create a build for Fren, fren is controlled by an ML agent.

You are allowed to control 1 ability. Your enemy's 1 ability is triggered randomly.

It's a duel between two electric brains, 1 with your assistance.

Very very unfinished, let me know what you think about seeing a game like this. :)

I have youtube:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeojEvBML-WWjf-79iOzf6g
